translated: If you understand reality by means of its own nature, then it is understood as the ultimate object.

original: 'gyur ro ; / de'i phyir rten sna tshogs pa nyid yin yang rang gi ngo bos ma rtogs pa ni yul ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ro ; / de'i phyir rten sna tshogs pa nyid yin yang rang gi ngo bos ma rtogs pa ni yul ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though the basis is various, that which is not understood by means of its own nature is not an object.

original: de'i rang bzhin 'ga' zhig de la rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir yul nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin 'ga' zhig de la rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir yul nyid do zhe na /
translated: We reply: It is an object because some nature of it is engaged in it.

original: gal te don dam par de'i rang bzhin sgra'i shes pa'i rjes su zhugs na 'o na ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa gzhan gyis kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te don dam par de'i rang bzhin sgra'i shes pa'i rjes su zhugs na 'o na ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa gzhan gyis kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If, in the ultimate sense, the nature of that is to conform to the cognition of sound, then it would be understood by another who apprehends the nature of the manifest.

original: rjes su zhugs pa ni rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pas nus pa ma yin no //üîΩrnam pa tha dad kyang ngo zhes pa las gcig nyid du mi 'gal lo zhe na de yang mi bden te 'di ltar /
analyzed: rjes su zhugs pa ni rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pas nus pa ma yin no // rnam pa tha dad kyang ngo zhes pa las gcig nyid du mi 'gal lo zhe na de yang mi bden te 'di ltar /
translated: It is not possible for that which conforms to one aspect to be understood in another aspect.

original: mthong ba rtogs pa med par ni //
analyzed: mthong ba rtogs pa med par ni //
translated: If you say that even though the aspects are different, there is no contradiction in their being one, that is also not correct.

original: brjod dang rnam rtog 'jug pa'i phyir //
analyzed: brjod dang rnam rtog 'jug pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the engagement of expression and conception,

original: mthong las ba lang la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: mthong las ba lang la sogs pa'i //
translated: the recognition of an object seen

original: ngo shes pa ni bzlog pa yin //
analyzed: ngo shes pa ni bzlog pa yin //
translated: is refuted.

original: brjod pa dang rtog pa dag gis mthong ba'i dngos po la mi rig go zhes da lta nyid bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa dang rtog pa dag gis mthong ba'i dngos po la mi rig go zhes da lta nyid bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: It has been proven that the object seen is not cognized by expression and conception.

original: gzung ba ngo shes pa yin na /
analyzed: gzung ba ngo shes pa yin na /
translated: If the object is recognized,

original: sgra dang rtogs pa dag gis ni 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra dang rtogs pa dag gis ni 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not apprehended by sound and conception.

original: des na ngo shes par ga las 'gyur /
analyzed: des na ngo shes par ga las 'gyur /
translated: How then could it be recognized?

original: 'o na ci ltar gang zhig bdag gi 'di las rtogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar gang zhig bdag gi 'di las rtogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes rtogs so zhe na /
translated: But if it is not so, how can one understand that this is the understanding of this?

original: ma rtogs kyang rtogs pa mngon bar rlom par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: ma rtogs kyang rtogs pa mngon bar rlom par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If one does not understand, can one not claim to understand?

original: 'o na ci ltar mig gnod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar mig gnod ce na /
translated: But how can the eye be harmed?

original: brtags na gnod pa nyid do //
analyzed: brtags na gnod pa nyid do //
translated: If one examines, it is harmed.

original: rtogs pa tha dad pa ni gnod par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rtogs pa tha dad pa ni gnod par byed pa yin la /
translated: The difference in understanding is what harms.

original: de yang sgra dang rtogs pa dag la yod pa nyid de ;
analyzed: de yang sgra dang rtogs pa dag la yod pa nyid de ;
translated: And that exists in sound and understanding,

original: dran par bya ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran par bya ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the object of memory.

original: dran pa de ni sngar bzung ba yin zhing mthong ba ni da ltar ba la yin no //
analyzed: dran pa de ni sngar bzung ba yin zhing mthong ba ni da ltar ba la yin no //
translated: That memory is of what was apprehended before, and seeing is of what is present.

original: gal te sgra dang rtogs pa dag gis mngon par rtogs pa yin na mthong bas ci bya zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: gal te sgra dang rtogs pa dag gis mngon par rtogs pa yin na mthong bas ci bya zhes bstan zin to //
translated: If it is an understanding through sound and understanding, what is the use of seeing?

original: de'i phyir ro shes pa yang mngon pa'i da rgyal tsam du zad kyi don dam par rtogs pa ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir ro shes pa yang mngon pa'i da rgyal tsam du zad kyi don dam par rtogs pa ni ma yin no ;
translated: Therefore, understanding is merely a claim, and ultimately there is no understanding.

original: / mthong ba las ni sngon gyi rjes su 'brangs nas gcig nyid kyi tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid 'ba' zhig yin gyi /
analyzed: / mthong ba las ni sngon gyi rjes su 'brangs nas gcig nyid kyi tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid 'ba' zhig yin gyi /
translated: From seeing, it is only the conceptual thought that, following the previous, establishes the convention of oneness.

original: don dam pa 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the apprehension of the ultimate.

original: ba lang la sogs mthong ba la //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs mthong ba la //
translated: In seeing a cow and so on,üîΩThe expression of the class and so on, and the conceptual thought,

original: rigs sogs brjod dang rnam rtog dag / rjes su 'gro las rjes dpog dag / de yang 'di yis sun phyung ngo //
analyzed: rigs sogs brjod dang rnam rtog dag / rjes su 'gro las rjes dpog dag / de yang 'di yis sun phyung ngo //
translated: Are inferred from the connection. That too is refuted by this.

original: rjod pa dang rtogs pa dag gis ni dngos po la reg pa ma yin na //
analyzed: rjod pa dang rtogs pa dag gis ni dngos po la reg pa ma yin na //
translated: If expressions and thoughts do not touch the thing,

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni don dam par 'ga' yang 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni don dam par 'ga' yang 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: The connection does not apprehend anything ultimately.

original: 'di ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal tsam mo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal tsam mo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To demonstrate that this is mere conceit,

original: mthong ba'i ci lta ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i ci lta ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because it remembers what was seen as it was.

original: mthong ba las ma reg na yang mthong ba dang 'brel pa'i @281b rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mthong ba las ma reg na yang mthong ba dang 'brel pa'i @281b rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin to //
translated: Even if it does not touch what was seen, it does not apprehend the nature that is connected to the seen.

original: des na mthong ba la spyi yod do zhes rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na mthong ba la spyi yod do zhes rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not understood that the universal exists in the seen.

original: 'o na ba lang de nyid 'di yin no zhes gcig tu rtogs shen /
analyzed: 'o na ba lang de nyid 'di yin no zhes gcig tu rtogs shen /
translated: But if the cow is the same, how can it be understood as different?

original: 'di la bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa ni /
translated: The answer is:

original: mthong ba tha dad nyid yin yang //
analyzed: mthong ba tha dad nyid yin yang //
translated: Although the seeing is different,

original: ngo shes pa zhes bya ba yis //üîΩrnam rtog gcig ni rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: ngo shes pa zhes bya ba yis // rnam rtog gcig ni rang bzhin gyis //
translated: it is called recognition.üîΩIt is said that a single thought

original: byed pa yin zhes brjod zin to //
analyzed: byed pa yin zhes brjod zin to //
translated: is naturally the agent.

original: phan tshun tha dad pa'i don gzhan dang gzhan 'dzin pa la brten pa'i mthong ba skyes pa ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa gcig 'dzin par nus pa'i lam na gnas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa'i don gzhan dang gzhan 'dzin pa la brten pa'i mthong ba skyes pa ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa gcig 'dzin par nus pa'i lam na gnas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The seeing that arises based on the apprehension of mutually different objects cannot be the path that abides in the ability to apprehend the aspect of sameness or difference.

original: 'on kyang rnam pa gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir na rang nyid goms pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi sa bon sad pas nus pa gsal bar brtas pa zhugs pa ni ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa skyed par byed la /
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam pa gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir na rang nyid goms pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi sa bon sad pas nus pa gsal bar brtas pa zhugs pa ni ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa skyed par byed la /
translated: However, because another aspect is impossible, the seed of the formative forces that accords with one's own familiarization is activated, and the clear development of potential generates the understanding of recognition.

original: rigs la sogs pa'i rtogs pa don med pa'i lam du zhugs pa ni de'i dbang gis yin no //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa'i rtogs pa don med pa'i lam du zhugs pa ni de'i dbang gis yin no //
translated: The entry into the path of meaningless understanding such as of class is due to that.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum ni bstan du med pa'i yul can yin no zhes gnas so //üîΩyid kyang don dang chags la sogs //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum ni bstan du med pa'i yul can yin no zhes gnas so // yid kyang don dang chags la sogs //
translated: Therefore, perception has an imperceptible object.

original: rang rig rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rang rig rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: The mental faculty is also non-conceptual

original: don dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: don dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i //
translated: with regard to its own nature and to objects such as desire.

original: rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i yid kyang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir mngon sum yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i yid kyang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir mngon sum yin te /
translated: The mental faculty is also perception because it is non-conceptual with regard to its own nature and to objects such as desire.

original: nyams su myong ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it functions by experiencing.

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pas 'jug par dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pas 'jug par dmigs pa yin la /
translated: The mental faculty is perceived to function by the mode of experiencing the very same eye consciousness, etc.

original: mig la sogs pas bskyed pa yang dbang po'i shes pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mig la sogs pas bskyed pa yang dbang po'i shes pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it the case that what is produced by the eye, etc., is the sense consciousness itself?

original: 'on te de las skyes pa yid yin na de'i tshe 'dis sngar myong ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te de las skyes pa yid yin na de'i tshe 'dis sngar myong ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if the mental faculty is produced from that, then it would apprehend what was previously experienced.üîΩTherefore:

original: de'i phyir // sngar myong ba ni 'dzin pa na //
analyzed: de'i phyir // sngar myong ba ni 'dzin pa na //
translated: When it apprehends what was previously experienced,

original: yid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin //
analyzed: yid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin //
translated: the mental faculty is not a valid cognition.

original: sngar myong ba dran par bya ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ni rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar myong ba dran par bya ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ni rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to understand that which is not of the nature of a remembered experience.

original: dran par bya ba ma yin par mngon sum byed pa ni sngar nyams su myong ngo zhes bya bar ci ltar 'gyur dngos po la sngar myong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dran par bya ba ma yin par mngon sum byed pa ni sngar nyams su myong ngo zhes bya bar ci ltar 'gyur dngos po la sngar myong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: How could one have the idea that one has experienced something that is not remembered?

original: ci ltar rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: ci ltar rtogs par bya ste /
translated: How could one understand that?

original: ngo shes pa ni bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: ngo shes pa ni bsal ba yin no //
translated: The recognition of something is the elimination of non-recognition.

original: 'on te ma mthong ba 'dzin na /
analyzed: 'on te ma mthong ba 'dzin na /
translated: But if one grasps what is not seen,

original: de lta na ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni /
translated: then in that case,

original: ma mthong 'dzin na long ba la //
analyzed: ma mthong 'dzin na long ba la //
translated: If one grasps what is not seen,

original: sogs pa yis kyang don mthong 'gyur //
analyzed: sogs pa yis kyang don mthong 'gyur //
translated: then even the blind would see objects.

original: long ba la yang yid yod pa des na de dang gzhan gyis don thams cad 'dzin par thal lo //
analyzed: long ba la yang yid yod pa des na de dang gzhan gyis don thams cad 'dzin par thal lo //
translated: Since the mind exists even for the blind, it follows that they and others would grasp all objects.

original: de'i phyir 'on pa dang long ba la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'on pa dang long ba la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the blind, the deaf, and so on would not exist.

original: skad cig nyid phyir 'das pa yi //
analyzed: skad cig nyid phyir 'das pa yi //
translated: Because of momentariness,

original: don mthong yod pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: don mthong yod pa ma yin zhing //
translated: the past object is not seen.

original: @282a * // skad cig min na mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: @282a * // skad cig min na mtshan nyid ni //
translated: If it were not momentary,

original: khyad par bcas pa brjod byar 'gyur //
analyzed: khyad par bcas pa brjod byar 'gyur //
translated: it would be expressed as having a distinguishing characteristic.

original: dngos po thams cad ni skad cig gis 'jig pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad ni skad cig gis 'jig pa yin te /
translated: All things are momentary and disintegrate.

original: des na gang gis gzung ba nyid 'dzin par byed pa ci ltar 'das pa 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: des na gang gis gzung ba nyid 'dzin par byed pa ci ltar 'das pa 'dzin pa yin /
translated: Therefore, how can that which apprehends what is grasped be the apprehension of the past?

original: ci ste skad cig ma yin pa nyid du khas len na de'i tshe sngar mthong ba gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ci ste skad cig ma yin pa nyid du khas len na de'i tshe sngar mthong ba gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: But if you accept that it is momentary, then, because it sees what was seen before,

original: dran pa bzhin du bzung zin pa 'dzin pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa bzhin du bzung zin pa 'dzin pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: like memory, it is not a valid cognition that apprehends what was already apprehended.

original: yid ni bzung zin pa nyid yin yang tshad ma yin na ni /
analyzed: yid ni bzung zin pa nyid yin yang tshad ma yin na ni /
translated: But if you say that the mental faculty is a valid cognition even though it apprehends what was already apprehended,

original: mtshan nyid khyad par bcas pa brjod par bya ba yin no //üîΩgzhan yang / bya ba sgrub can las la ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid khyad par bcas pa brjod par bya ba yin no // gzhan yang / bya ba sgrub can las la ni //
translated: then you must state the specific characteristics of valid knowledge.üîΩMoreover: It does not make the slightest difference

original: khyad par cung zad mi byed pa //üîΩdbang po can nam gzhan dag ni //
analyzed: khyad par cung zad mi byed pa // dbang po can nam gzhan dag ni //
translated: in the activity of the agent.

original: sgrub par byed par ci ltar 'dod //
analyzed: sgrub par byed par ci ltar 'dod //
translated: How can you claim that the one who possesses the sense facultyüîΩis the agent?üîΩWhat activity can another perform

original: gang zhig dbang po'i shes bas rang bzhin yongs su bcad pa de la gzhan gyis bya ba ci yod /
analyzed: gang zhig dbang po'i shes bas rang bzhin yongs su bcad pa de la gzhan gyis bya ba ci yod /
translated: with regard to that which is already ascertained by a sense consciousness?

original: rang bzhin de nyid yongs su gcod do zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin de nyid yongs su gcod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it ascertains that very nature,üîΩthen it is not a valid cognition.

original: yongs su bcad pa la yongs su gcod pa'i don ci yin /
analyzed: yongs su bcad pa la yongs su gcod pa'i don ci yin /
translated: What is the meaning of determination?

original: rang gi ngo bo snang ba nyid de gzhan la yang skyon ci yod ce na /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo snang ba nyid de gzhan la yang skyon ci yod ce na /
translated: It is the appearance of its own nature. What is wrong with that?

original: de lta na rtag pa la yongs su bcad pa nyid rtag tu yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta na rtag pa la yongs su bcad pa nyid rtag tu yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is always determined, then it is always existent.

original: de la gzhan gyis bya ba ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyis bya ba ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
translated: What function could another perform?

original: da ltar gzhan gyis bcad do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: da ltar gzhan gyis bcad do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is determined by another in the present, that is not so.

original: rtag pa'i phyir da ltar yang de nyid yin pas gzhan la yang nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa'i phyir da ltar yang de nyid yin pas gzhan la yang nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is permanent, it is just that in the present, and another has no power.

original: de'i yongs su gcod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ma 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: de'i yongs su gcod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ma 'brel ba ste /
translated: To say that it is because there is no determination of it is incoherent.

original: yongs su gcod par byed pa med na rtag pa nyid du mi 'dzin ba'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan gyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su gcod par byed pa med na rtag pa nyid du mi 'dzin ba'i phyir ro // gzhan gyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Because if there is no determination, it is not apprehended as permanent.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is apprehended by another, that is not so.

original: yid ches pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid ches pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no confidence in that.

original: ci ltar gzhan rang gi dus nyid rtogs par byed pas rtag pa nyid rtogs ;
analyzed: ci ltar gzhan rang gi dus nyid rtogs par byed pas rtag pa nyid rtogs ;
translated: How is it that another realizes permanence by realizing its own time?

original: de'i phyir yongs su gcod par byed pa nyid kyis gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa gzhan don med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yongs su gcod par byed pa nyid kyis gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa gzhan don med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no need for another apprehender to make the object remain in order to make it be apprehended.

original: de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood to be of that nature.

original: dngos po de las skyes pa'i blo'ang //
analyzed: dngos po de las skyes pa'i blo'ang //
translated: Also, the cognition that arises from that object

original: thams cad cig car 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad cig car 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: would occur all at once.

original: gzhan gyis khyad par bya min na //
analyzed: gzhan gyis khyad par bya min na //
translated: If it were not distinguished by another,

original: de las ltos pa 'gal phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ltos pa 'gal phyir ro //
translated: that would contradict its dependence on it.

original: de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa rtag pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa thams cad dus gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa rtag pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa thams cad dus gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: If the cognition that engages in the permanent apprehension of its aspect were to occur at all times,

original: dus tha dad pa na ni rtag pa gcig nyid kyi yul can du 'gal te /
analyzed: dus tha dad pa na ni rtag pa gcig nyid kyi yul can du 'gal te /
translated: then it would contradict being the object of a single permanent thing at different times,

original: rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the aspects would be different.

original: 'on te dus phyis rgyu gzhan las skyes pa de'i tshe yang de'i dus 'dzin par 'gyur dgos @282b so ;
analyzed: 'on te dus phyis rgyu gzhan las skyes pa de'i tshe yang de'i dus 'dzin par 'gyur dgos @282b so ;
translated: But if it arises from another cause later, then at that time it would have to apprehend that.

original: / de lta ma yin na 'dzin par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / de lta ma yin na 'dzin par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not suitable to apprehend it if it is not like that.

original: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba ste /
analyzed: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba ste /
translated: One sees true dreams.

original: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba ni de'i dus su rtogs pa nyid 'dzin par mthong ngo //
analyzed: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba ni de'i dus su rtogs pa nyid 'dzin par mthong ngo //
translated: The seeing of a true dream is the seeing of the realization itself at that time.

original: dbang po'i shes pa las yid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa gzhan du ni dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa las yid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa gzhan du ni dmigs pa med do //
translated: The mental experience of a sense consciousness does not have a different object.

original: ma dmigs pa la ni dmigs so zhes 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma dmigs pa la ni dmigs so zhes 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not tenable to say that it does not observe what is not observed.

original: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition.

original: gzhan dag ni gal te yid kyis mi dmigs na yid kyis dran par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni gal te yid kyis mi dmigs na yid kyis dran par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: Others say: If the mental consciousness does not observe, it would not remember what was observed by the sense consciousnesses.

original: 'dir de las gzhan gang gis kyang //
analyzed: 'dir de las gzhan gang gis kyang //
translated: Here, it is never remembered by anything other than that.

original: rang gis rig dran nam yang med //üîΩgal te tha dad pa'i phyir dbang po'i shes pas bzung ba yid kyis dran pa ma yin na ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas kyang bzung ba dran par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang gis rig dran nam yang med // gal te tha dad pa'i phyir dbang po'i shes pas bzung ba yid kyis dran pa ma yin na ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas kyang bzung ba dran par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is never remembered by itself.

original: de dag kyang tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the mental consciousness does not remember what was apprehended by the sense consciousnesses because they are different, then it would not remember what was apprehended by the conceptual consciousnesses because they are also different.

original: yid yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: yid yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say it is because they are mental consciousnesses,

original: shes pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would also be because they are consciousnesses.

original: de'i phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes //
translated: Therefore the mental consciousness is the result of the sense consciousnesses.

original: de ma thag rkyen las byung can //
analyzed: de ma thag rkyen las byung can //
translated: It arises from the immediately preceding condition.

original: yid ni yul gzhan nyid 'dzin byed //
analyzed: yid ni yul gzhan nyid 'dzin byed //
translated: The mental consciousness apprehends the object of another sense consciousness.

original: de phyir long bas mthong ba min //
analyzed: de phyir long bas mthong ba min //
translated: Therefore, the blind do not see.

original: rang gi yul gyi de ma thag pa'i yul lhan cig byed pa can dbang po'i shes pas bskyed pa'i yid kyang mngon sum mo //
analyzed: rang gi yul gyi de ma thag pa'i yul lhan cig byed pa can dbang po'i shes pas bskyed pa'i yid kyang mngon sum mo //
translated: The mental consciousness, which is produced by a sense consciousness that has as its object its own object and the immediately preceding condition, is also a direct perception.

original: gal te de dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mnyam par 'byung ba yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mnyam par 'byung ba yin na ni /
translated: If it arises simultaneously with the sense consciousness,

original: de dbang po'i shes pa nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir na yid don med do //
analyzed: de dbang po'i shes pa nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir na yid don med do //
translated: then the mental consciousness is useless, because it apprehends the object that is apprehended by the sense consciousness.

original: dbang po'i shes pa rgyun 'chad na gzhan dmigs pa med pa'i phyir 'di gang gi mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa rgyun 'chad na gzhan dmigs pa med pa'i phyir 'di gang gi mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
translated: If the continuum of the sense consciousness is interrupted, then it does not apprehend another object. Therefore, what is its characteristic?

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, the opponent says:üîΩThe mental consciousness is direct perception,

original: goms las mdun na gnas pa la //
analyzed: goms las mdun na gnas pa la //
translated: because it is the consciousness that knows the object that is present before one,

original: 'di'o zhes sogs shes pa gang //
analyzed: 'di'o zhes sogs shes pa gang //
translated: such as this, through familiarity.

original: mngon du byed phyir de la ni //üîΩyid kyi mngon sum yin par 'dod //
analyzed: mngon du byed phyir de la ni // yid kyi mngon sum yin par 'dod //
translated: It is direct perception because it manifests the object.

original: 'di zhes mdun na gnas pa la mngon du byed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ni yid kyi mngon sum mo //
analyzed: 'di zhes mdun na gnas pa la mngon du byed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ni yid kyi mngon sum mo //
translated: The mental consciousness is direct perception, because it engages the object that is present before one, such as this, through the mode of manifestation.

original: 'on te mig gi byed pa nyid las skye ba ni mig gi shes pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te mig gi byed pa nyid las skye ba ni mig gi shes pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: But if you think that the eye sense faculty is the cause of the arising of the eye consciousness, that is not so.

original: mig gi shes pa ni gzugs snang ba tsam la nye bar mkho ba yin la sngar goms pa ni nges pa la yin no //
analyzed: mig gi shes pa ni gzugs snang ba tsam la nye bar mkho ba yin la sngar goms pa ni nges pa la yin no //
translated: The eye consciousness is merely the condition for the appearance of form, but prior habituation is the cause of ascertainment.

original: 'di la mig gi byed pa med pas yid sngar goms pa'i mtshan nyid las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di la mig gi byed pa med pas yid sngar goms pa'i mtshan nyid las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the eye sense faculty is not the cause of ascertainment, the eye consciousness arises from the characteristics of prior habituation of the mental faculty.

original: 'di ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no //
translated: Therefore it is mental direct perception.

original: ci ste rnam pa de ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir yid don med do snyam na mos pa lhag pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ste rnam pa de ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir yid don med do snyam na mos pa lhag pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if you think that the mental faculty is meaningless because the aspect is apprehended by the eye consciousness and so on, that is not so, because it is possible that there is an excess of interest.

original: 'di zhes bya bas 'jug par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya bas 'jug par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The mental faculty is engaged by the phrase ‚Äúthis.‚Äù

original: @283a * // des na 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid do //
analyzed: @283a * // des na 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid do //
translated: Therefore it is valid knowledge because it engages the object.

original: 'o na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa 'jug par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa 'jug par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: But if you think that the eye consciousness and so on are not engaged, that is not so.

original: shin tu goms pa las gzhan rnam par rtog pa na yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu goms pa las gzhan rnam par rtog pa na yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it occurs even when there is another conceptualization.

original: des na 'di lta bu'i yid ni /
analyzed: des na 'di lta bu'i yid ni /
translated: Therefore, this kind of mental cognition

original: sngar gzung ba rtogs pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: sngar gzung ba rtogs pa ma yin te ;
translated: is not the cognition of the object previously grasped,

original: 'on kyang de'i dus phyis byung ba yin no //üîΩgzung ba la 'dzin pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i dus phyis byung ba yin no // gzung ba la 'dzin pa yang ma yin no //
translated: but rather it occurs later at the time of that object.üîΩIt is not the grasping of the object grasped.

original: gzung ba la 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzung ba la 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the grasping of the object grasped,

original: nye bar gnas pa la sngar gyi 'dzin pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar gnas pa la sngar gyi 'dzin pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the previous grasping does not occur in regard to what is present.

original: 'o na dus gcig tu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na dus gcig tu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well, then, there would be the attainment of two aspects at one time.

original: 'di rnam pa gnyis nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'di rnam pa gnyis nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not the case that there are two aspects?

original: 'o na gcig tu zhen par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gcig tu zhen par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Well, then, how can there be the conception of one?

original: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis mthong ba'i tshul du skyon med do //
analyzed: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis mthong ba'i tshul du skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, just as two people with an eye disease see two moons.

original: 'on goms pa las skyes pa mdun na gnas pa'i rnam par 'dzin pa'i bde ba la sogs pa yang yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on goms pa las skyes pa mdun na gnas pa'i rnam par 'dzin pa'i bde ba la sogs pa yang yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: But the pleasure, etc., of the present object that arises from habituation would be by nature mental perception.

original: des na dbang po las byung ba'i bde ba zhes bya ba de nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na dbang po las byung ba'i bde ba zhes bya ba de nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the so-called pleasure arising from the sense faculties is lost.

original: bden te / de ni nyams pa nyid do //
analyzed: bden te / de ni nyams pa nyid do //
translated: That is true, it is lost.

original: 'di ma nyams pas ni cung zad kyang byar med do //
analyzed: 'di ma nyams pas ni cung zad kyang byar med do //
translated: But because this is not lost, nothing is done.

original: dbang po las byung ba'i bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po las byung ba'i bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: It is contradictory to say that pleasure and pain arise from the sense faculties.

original: 'dir yang rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyi tshig dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /üîΩchags pa dang / sdang ba dang / gti mug dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal la sogs pa rang rig pa ni dbang po la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir yang rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyi tshig dang 'gal bar 'gyur te / chags pa dang / sdang ba dang / gti mug dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal la sogs pa rang rig pa ni dbang po la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, it would contradict the words of the root master.

original: yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes so //
analyzed: yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes so //
translated: Because attachment, aversion, confusion, pleasure, pain, and so on are self-cognized, they are mental direct perception because they do not depend on the sense faculties.

original: 'o na ni chos kyi grags pa'i dbang po las byung ba nyid kyi bde ba dang bde ba ma yin ba zhes bya ba 'di grags pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni chos kyi grags pa'i dbang po las byung ba nyid kyi bde ba dang bde ba ma yin ba zhes bya ba 'di grags pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But then it would be incorrect to say that pleasure and pain arise from the sense faculties, as Dharmakirti says.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni bde ba'i rgyu ro la sogs pa brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni bde ba'i rgyu ro la sogs pa brjod pa yin te /
translated: The words pleasure and so on refer to taste and so on, which are the causes of pleasure.

original: rnam par mi rtog kyang dbang po'i shes pa tsha ba dang zhim pa la sogs par snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog kyang dbang po'i shes pa tsha ba dang zhim pa la sogs par snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Even though they are nonconceptual, the sense consciousnesses appear as hot, delicious and so on.

original: yang na rtog pa med par chos mthun pa'i phyir yid nyid la de skad brjod pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: yang na rtog pa med par chos mthun pa'i phyir yid nyid la de skad brjod pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
translated: Or else, because they are similar in being nonconceptual, it is not contradictory to say that the mind itself is like that.

original: gal te yid rnam pa gzhan du 'dzin cing dbang po'i shes pa yang gzhan du 'dzin na /
analyzed: gal te yid rnam pa gzhan du 'dzin cing dbang po'i shes pa yang gzhan du 'dzin na /
translated: If the mind apprehends one aspect and the sense consciousness apprehends another,

original: 'o na rnam pa du mar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na rnam pa du mar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: then there would be many aspects.

original: dbang po'i shes pa la yang thal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa la yang thal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: That would also follow for sense consciousness.

original: dbang po'i shes pa yang goms pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam pa du mar 'jug pa mi zlogs  so //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa yang goms pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam pa du mar 'jug pa mi zlogs  so //
translated: It is undeniable that sense consciousness engages many aspects in accordance with its familiarity.

original: de lta bu 'o na 'di zhes bya ba'i shes pa yang goms pa las dbang pos bskyed @283b ba nyid yin gyi yid nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu 'o na 'di zhes bya ba'i shes pa yang goms pa las dbang pos bskyed @283b ba nyid yin gyi yid nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the consciousness that is like this is generated by the sense faculty from familiarity and it is not the mind itself.

original: byed pa gzhan yang rtogs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di ni zhes bya ba 'di ni yid kyis byed pa yin te /
analyzed: byed pa gzhan yang rtogs pa'i phyir ro // 'di ni zhes bya ba 'di ni yid kyis byed pa yin te /
translated: because it is the cause of the understanding of other things.

original: de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'o na yid kyi shes pa 'di de zhes bya bar /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro // 'o na yid kyi shes pa 'di de zhes bya bar /
translated: This is the mental activity, because it is the cause of the understanding of reality.

original: lkog tu gyur ba la yang ci ltar mi 'jug ce na /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur ba la yang ci ltar mi 'jug ce na /
translated: But how can this mental consciousness engage the hidden?

original: 'di ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: This is not good,

original: lkog tu gyur la 'jug pa ni //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur la 'jug pa ni //
translated: because the engagement of the hidden

original: mngon du byed pas 'jug min pa //
analyzed: mngon du byed pas 'jug min pa //
translated: is not the engagement of the manifest.

original: de phyir de ni mngon sum nyid //
analyzed: de phyir de ni mngon sum nyid //
translated: Therefore, it is not direct perception.

original: yin zhes ji ltar nges pa yin //
analyzed: yin zhes ji ltar nges pa yin //
translated: How is it ascertained?

original: mngon sum gyi don ni mngon du byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi don ni mngon du byed pa nyid do //
translated: The meaning of direct perception is the manifest.

original: yid de nyid 'ga' zhig la ni mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa yin la /
analyzed: yid de nyid 'ga' zhig la ni mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa yin la /
translated: That mental consciousness is the manifest aspect for some,

original: 'ga' zhig la ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la ma yin no //
translated: but not for others.

original: bya ba ga las she na /
analyzed: bya ba ga las she na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'o na dbang po'i shes pa yang 'ga' zhig la 'khrul pa yin la /
analyzed: 'o na dbang po'i shes pa yang 'ga' zhig la 'khrul pa yin la /
translated: But the sense consciousness is mistaken for some,üîΩbut not for others.

original: 'ga' zhig la ma yin no zhes bya ba ga las rab rib kyi tshogs pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la ma yin no zhes bya ba ga las rab rib kyi tshogs pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: How is that? Because of the existence of another group of cataracts.

original: 'di la yang tshogs pa gzhan yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di la yang tshogs pa gzhan yod pa nyid do //
translated: And in this case, there is another collection.

original: 'di ltar / rang don rjes 'gro'i don ltos can //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rang don rjes 'gro'i don ltos can //
translated: Thus:

original: dbang skyes blo ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: dbang skyes blo ni rgyu yin no //
translated: The cognition born of the sense faculty is the cause,üîΩwhich is dependent on the object that conforms to its own purpose.

original: de phyir 'di gzhan 'dzin na yang ;
analyzed: de phyir 'di gzhan 'dzin na yang ;
translated: Therefore, even when it apprehends something else,

original: / nges pa 'dzin par 'dod pa yin //üîΩdbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i rang gi don skad cig dang po'am /
analyzed: / nges pa 'dzin par 'dod pa yin // dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i rang gi don skad cig dang po'am /
translated: it is accepted as apprehending the ascertained object.

original: rgyun de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i don gyi skad cig gang yin pa de la ltos pa'i dbang po'i shes pa ni yid skyed bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyun de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i don gyi skad cig gang yin pa de la ltos pa'i dbang po'i shes pa ni yid skyed bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The cognition of the sense faculty is the cause that generates the mental cognition, which is dependent on the object of the first moment of the sense faculty's own object, or on any moment of the object that conforms to the continuum.

original: gang zhig tshogs pa 'dis ma bskyed pa de ni mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig tshogs pa 'dis ma bskyed pa de ni mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: That which is not generated by this collection is not a direct perception.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na yul nges pa nyid kyis yul gzhan rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na yul nges pa nyid kyis yul gzhan rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason, it is not a cognition of another object due to the restriction of the object.

original: gang gi phyir yul gzhan gyis bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yul gzhan gyis bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not generated by another object.

original: de nyid kyis bskyed pa yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis bskyed pa yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
translated: How do you know that it is generated by that very object and not by another?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yang ci'i phyir sgras bskyed pa ma yin zhes 'di ni dbang po'i shes pa la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yang ci'i phyir sgras bskyed pa ma yin zhes 'di ni dbang po'i shes pa la yang mtshungs so //
translated: Why is visual consciousness not also generated by sound? This is the same for the sense consciousnesses.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the relation of cause and effect is definite.

original: 'di la yang tshangs pas dmod pa ma 'dor ba'i phyir gzhan du yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di la yang tshangs pas dmod pa ma 'dor ba'i phyir gzhan du yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same for other cases, because the curse of BrahmƒÅ does not apply.

original: skad cig gnyis pa yang dbang po'i shes pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: skad cig gnyis pa yang dbang po'i shes pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: The second moment is also apprehended by a sense consciousness,

original: de ltar yang mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yang mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: because it is seen in that way.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not,

original: de la yid kyi rnam pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yid kyi rnam pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it also has a mental aspect.

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not conceptual,

original: mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa'ang gsal ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa'ang gsal ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the aspect of the object that is present is merely clear.

original: gal te yid kyi shes pa'i mngon sum dbang po'i shes pa dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te yid kyi shes pa'i mngon sum dbang po'i shes pa dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba yin na /
translated: If the direct perception of mental consciousness occurs simultaneously with the sense consciousnesses,

original: 'o na ci ltar dbang po'i shes pa 'di mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i @284a * //
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar dbang po'i shes pa 'di mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i @284a * //
translated: then how is it that the sense consciousnesses are not equivalent immediately preceding conditions for mental consciousness?

original: rkyen yin / rang gi shes pa'i dus na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i don ni sngar gyi shes pa'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rkyen yin / rang gi shes pa'i dus na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i don ni sngar gyi shes pa'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The object of the mental consciousness at the time of its own consciousness is not the simultaneous cause of the prior consciousness.üîΩBecause it is not possible for different times to be simultaneous causes.

original: dus tha dad pa dag lhan cig byed pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhen 'di la bshad pa /üîΩde dang byed dus mtshungs med can //
analyzed: dus tha dad pa dag lhan cig byed pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhen 'di la bshad pa / de dang byed dus mtshungs med can //
translated: This is explained as follows:üîΩIt is not the case that the object

original: rang shes dus can don dag ni //üîΩci ltar dbang po'i shes pa yi ;
analyzed: rang shes dus can don dag ni // ci ltar dbang po'i shes pa yi ;
translated: of the mental consciousness is not simultaneous with it.

original: / lhan cig byed pa yin zhe na //
analyzed: / lhan cig byed pa yin zhe na //
translated: How is it the simultaneous cause of the sense consciousness?

original: mi rigs te /
analyzed: mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable.

original: 'di ltar / med pa sngar nus med phyir dang // phyis kyang nye bar mi sbyor phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / med pa sngar nus med phyir dang // phyis kyang nye bar mi sbyor phyir //
translated: Because the nonexistent is not a prior potentiality and because it does not subsequently connect,

original: rgyu rnams thams cad sngar yod yin //üîΩde phyir rang blo bcas don min //
analyzed: rgyu rnams thams cad sngar yod yin // de phyir rang blo bcas don min //
translated: all causes exist prior to the effect.üîΩTherefore the object is not the simultaneous cause of the mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i don ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mi mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i don ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mi mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: The object of the mental consciousness is not not simultaneous with the sense consciousness.

original: de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa las dus snga ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa las dus snga ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is prior to the mental consciousness.

original: yul ni rgyu yin la /
analyzed: yul ni rgyu yin la /
translated: The object is the cause.

original: rgyu yang 'bras bu dang dus gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu yang 'bras bu dang dus gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: And the cause does not exist at the same time as the effect.

original: 'bras bu dang dus gcig na ni sngar med pa yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang dus gcig na ni sngar med pa yin la /
translated: If it existed at the same time as the effect, it would not be prior.

original: med pa yang sngar nus pa med do //
analyzed: med pa yang sngar nus pa med do //
translated: And what does not exist is not a prior cause.

original: phyis 'bras bu'i dus na 'bras bu nyid yod pa'i phyir nus pa don med do //
analyzed: phyis 'bras bu'i dus na 'bras bu nyid yod pa'i phyir nus pa don med do //
translated: Later, at the time of the effect, the effect already exists, so the cause is pointless.

original: de ltar na gal te 'bras bu'i dus su yin na de'i tshe 'bras bu yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na gal te 'bras bu'i dus su yin na de'i tshe 'bras bu yod pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, if it is at the time of the effect, then at that time the effect already exists.

original: de'i phyir rgyu thams cad ni sngar yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu thams cad ni sngar yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, all causes exist prior to the effect.

original: des na rgyu'i don ni 'bras bu ru 'gyur ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba ma yin no //üîΩdus tha dad pa ji ltar 'dzin //
analyzed: des na rgyu'i don ni 'bras bu ru 'gyur ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba ma yin no // dus tha dad pa ji ltar 'dzin //
translated: Thus, the meaning of cause is not that which arises simultaneously with the consciousness that apprehends the effect.

original: ce na rig pa shes pa yis //
analyzed: ce na rig pa shes pa yis //
translated: How can there be a difference in time between the object and the consciousness?üîΩIf you say that the object is known by a subsequent consciousness,

original: shes pa'i rnam pa 'jog nus pa'i //
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa 'jog nus pa'i //
translated: then the cause of the consciousness that is able to posit the aspect of the object

original: rgyu nyid la ni gzung ba shes //
analyzed: rgyu nyid la ni gzung ba shes //
translated: is known as the object.

original: rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid gzung ba yin gyi de'i rnam par shes pa skye ba ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid gzung ba yin gyi de'i rnam par shes pa skye ba ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it that the appearance as the object by virtue of its own nature is the object, but the arising of the consciousness in the aspect of that is not?

original: snang ba yang shes pa dang dus mnyam pa'i phyir ji ltar rgyu nyid gzung ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba yang shes pa dang dus mnyam pa'i phyir ji ltar rgyu nyid gzung ba yin zhe na /
translated: And since the appearance is simultaneous with consciousness, how can it be the cause of consciousness?

original: snang ba zhes bya 'di ci zhig //
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya 'di ci zhig //
translated: What is this so-called appearance?

original: ci don gyi ngo bo'am /
analyzed: ci don gyi ngo bo'am /
translated: Is it the entity of the object?

original: 'on te gzhan nyid /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan nyid /
translated: Or is it something else?

original: gal te don gyi ngo bo yin na ni sngon po la sogs pa ltar nam yang ngo bo de las nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe snang bar thal lo //
analyzed: gal te don gyi ngo bo yin na ni sngon po la sogs pa ltar nam yang ngo bo de las nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe snang bar thal lo //
translated: If it is the entity of the object, then like blue, etc., it never departs from its entity, and it follows that it is always apparent.

original: shes pa med pa'i phyir snang ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa med pa'i phyir snang ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not apparent because it is not consciousness,

original: shes pas kyang de nyid bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes pas kyang de nyid bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: is it not the case that consciousness is also not that?

original: de ni sngar yang yod pa'i phyir ji ltar yang snang bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de ni sngar yang yod pa'i phyir ji ltar yang snang bar mi 'gyur /
translated: Since it existed previously, how could it be apparent?

original: shes pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa don med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that consciousness is meaningless,

original: de bzhin du 'di ni skyon gzhan yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di ni skyon gzhan yin te /
translated: this is another fault.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni sngar mi snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni sngar mi snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Its entity does not previously not appear.

original: de nyid yod la de nyid med do zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
analyzed: de nyid yod la de nyid med do zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
translated: It is contradictory to say that it exists and that it does not exist.

original: 'on te shes pa yod na mthong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa yod na mthong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if consciousness exists, it sees, not otherwise?

original: ci da ni shes pa snang ba la byed pa po yin nam byed pa po nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: ci da ni shes pa snang ba la byed pa po yin nam byed pa po nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Is consciousness the agent of appearance now, or not?

original: dus mnyam pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dus mnyam pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is not, because they are simultaneous.

original: med pa sngar nus @284b med phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa sngar nus @284b med phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has been demonstrated that the nonexistent is not a cause, etc.

original: dus mnyam pa nyid du mthong yang shes pa med par ma yin pa'i phyir 'di la ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: dus mnyam pa nyid du mthong yang shes pa med par ma yin pa'i phyir 'di la ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: But if they are simultaneous, it is not the case that there is no consciousness without appearance. What is the problem here?

original: de lta na 'o na ni de nyid kyi tshe mig las skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni de nyid kyi tshe mig las skyes pa yin te /
translated: If that is so, then it arises from the eye at that time,

original: des na don gyi ngo bo ma yin no //
analyzed: des na don gyi ngo bo ma yin no //
translated: and it is not the entity of the object.

original: don sngar yod na da ltar skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don sngar yod na da ltar skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If the object exists previously, it arises in the present.

original: gang yod na ni gang skye zhing //
analyzed: gang yod na ni gang skye zhing //
translated: If something exists, what arises?

original: gnas pa nyid na 'jig 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gnas pa nyid na 'jig 'gyur ba //
translated: If it endures, it is destroyed.

original: de las de bzhin nyid 'gyur te //
analyzed: de las de bzhin nyid 'gyur te //
translated: It would be just like that,

original: tha dad mtshan nyid yod phyir ro //üîΩgang phyis bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ni //
analyzed: tha dad mtshan nyid yod phyir ro // gang phyis bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ni //
translated: because the characteristics would exist separately.üîΩIf the reflection of a face exists later,

original: bzhin yod na ni phyis 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: bzhin yod na ni phyis 'byung ba'i //
translated: it arises later if the face exists.

original: phyir na bzhin las tha dad pa //
analyzed: phyir na bzhin las tha dad pa //
translated: And the reflection is not different from the face.

original: de bzhin kho bo'i snang ba'ang 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin kho bo'i snang ba'ang 'gyur //
translated: In the same way, the appearance is not different from the mind.

original: gal te yul tha dad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gal te yul tha dad pa'i phyir //
translated: If the reflection is different from the face,

original: gzugs brnyan tha dad nyid 'gyur te //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan tha dad nyid 'gyur te //
translated: then the reflection would be seen without seeing the face.

original: gdong dang gzugs brnyan tha dad de //üîΩchad mas rtogs pa nyid kyang yin //üîΩdon las snang ba tha dad pa'i //
analyzed: gdong dang gzugs brnyan tha dad de // chad mas rtogs pa nyid kyang yin // don las snang ba tha dad pa'i //
translated: But the face and the reflection are not different,üîΩand the reflection is not seen without the face.

original: sgrub par byed pa mthong ba med //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa mthong ba med //
translated: And we do not see any proof that the appearance is different from the object.

original: des na snang dang sngo sogs dag / don gcig par ni grub ce na /
analyzed: des na snang dang sngo sogs dag / don gcig par ni grub ce na /
translated: Therefore, the appearance and the blue, etc. are established as being the same entity.

original: de lta na ni 'on /üîΩji ltar mig la sogs pa las //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'on / ji ltar mig la sogs pa las //
translated: If that is so, then the appearanceüîΩwould arise from the eye, etc.

original: snang ba de ltar 'byung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: snang ba de ltar 'byung 'gyur ba //
translated: In the same way that the appearance arises,

original: de bzhin sngo sogs kyang 'gyur te //
analyzed: de bzhin sngo sogs kyang 'gyur te //
translated: the blue, etc. would also arise,

original: grub dang bde ba mtshungs phyir ro //üîΩji ltar mig la sogs pa yi //
analyzed: grub dang bde ba mtshungs phyir ro // ji ltar mig la sogs pa yi //
translated: because the establishment and the pleasure are the same.

original: snga rol nyid du don yod pa //
analyzed: snga rol nyid du don yod pa //
translated: If the object exists prior to the eye, etc.,

original: de bzhin du ni snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni snang bar 'gyur //
translated: then the appearance would be just like that.

original: de ltar de ni mthong ba med //
analyzed: de ltar de ni mthong ba med //
translated: But it is not seen in that way.

original: de phyir sngo sogs snang ba las //
analyzed: de phyir sngo sogs snang ba las //
translated: Therefore, the appearance of blue, etc.

original: tha dad par ni 'dod pa gang //
analyzed: tha dad par ni 'dod pa gang //
translated: is accepted as being different from the blue, etc.

original: de ni sngo sogs snang ba las ;
analyzed: de ni sngo sogs snang ba las ;
translated: But it is held that the blue, etc.,

original: / sngon yod par ni 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: / sngon yod par ni 'dod pa yin //
translated: exist prior to the appearance of blue, etc.

original: de yi de ma thag skyes pa //
analyzed: de yi de ma thag skyes pa //
translated: The consciousness that arises immediately after thatüîΩis the apprehender of the blue, etc.,

original: sngon po la sogs snang ba yis //üîΩrnam shes de ni 'dzin byed de //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs snang ba yis // rnam shes de ni 'dzin byed de //
translated: that appear,

original: pha gzugs 'dzin pa ci bzhin no //
analyzed: pha gzugs 'dzin pa ci bzhin no //
translated: just as it apprehends the form of the father.

original: rgyu du ma nyid yod na yang //
analyzed: rgyu du ma nyid yod na yang //
translated: Even though there are many causes,

original: 'bras bu rjes bde skye ba gang //
analyzed: 'bras bu rjes bde skye ba gang //
translated: the effect that arises is similar to the cause.

original: de ni de yis ngo bo de //
analyzed: de ni de yis ngo bo de //
translated: That is its nature.

original: gzhan dang gzung zhes brjod pa yin //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzung zhes brjod pa yin //
translated: It is said to be different from the other, the object.

original: dper na bu pa'i gzugs 'dzin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bu pa'i gzugs 'dzin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying ‚ÄúI apprehend the form of my father.‚Äù

original: bde ba la sogs pa rang rig pa'i yid kyang mngon sum mo //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rang rig pa'i yid kyang mngon sum mo //
translated: The mind that is self-aware of pleasure, etc., is also perception.

original: de lta na rnam par rtog pa rang gi ngo bo la mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta na rnam par rtog pa rang gi ngo bo la mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: In that case, is it not the case that conceptual thoughts are not perception with regard to their own nature?

original: de lta yin dang rnam par shes pa lkog tu gyur pa'i gzhung du thal lo zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin dang rnam par shes pa lkog tu gyur pa'i gzhung du thal lo zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If that is so, it would follow that consciousness would be hidden, but that is not so.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi rang rig pa la mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi rang rig pa la mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all minds and mental factors are perception with regard to their own awareness.

original: bde ba la sogs pa smos pa ni nyams su myong ba gsal ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa smos pa ni nyams su myong ba gsal ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The words ‚Äúpleasure, etc.‚Äù are mentioned in order to indicate the clear experience.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid med pa'i phyir /
translated: If there is no non-conceptuality in conceptualization,

original: ji ltar mngon sum yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon sum yin te /
translated: how can it be direct perception?

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni rtog pa med pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni rtog pa med pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The nature of conceptualization is not non-conceptual.

original: @285a * // don la rtog pa med pa yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: @285a * // don la rtog pa med pa yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is said that it is non-conceptual with regard to the object, that is not so.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te don la rtog na ni //üîΩngo bo nyid la rtog par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te don la rtog na ni // ngo bo nyid la rtog par 'gyur //
translated: If it conceptualizes the object,üîΩit would conceptualize its own nature.

original: ngo bo nyid la de yi ni //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid la de yi ni //
translated: With regard to its own nature,

original: rang bzhin gzhan par rig ma yin //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan par rig ma yin //
translated: its nature is not known as other.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: bde sogs bdag nyid gzhan mi rten //
analyzed: bde sogs bdag nyid gzhan mi rten //
translated: Pleasure, etc. do not depend on another nature,

original: brda byed par ni nus ma yin //
analyzed: brda byed par ni nus ma yin //
translated: and are not able to create a convention.

original: de phyir de dag rang rig ni //
analyzed: de phyir de dag rang rig ni //
translated: Therefore, their self-awareness

original: brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin //
analyzed: brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin //
translated: is not related to expression.

original: skye ba thob pa nyid na bde ba la sogs pa bdag nyid rig pa'i yul gyi dngos po 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: skye ba thob pa nyid na bde ba la sogs pa bdag nyid rig pa'i yul gyi dngos po 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: When born, pleasure, etc. are the object of self-awareness that grasps the entity.

original: de las ma gtogs pa de rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pa de rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because apart from that, there is no awareness.

original: de'i tshe yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po mngon par brjod pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba'i skabs ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po mngon par brjod pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba'i skabs ci zhig yod /
translated: And at that time, what occasion is there for the connection by means of the expression of the prior and subsequent states?

original: phyis sbyor ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: phyis sbyor ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that they are connected later, that is not so,

original: de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not exist.

original: gzhan gyis snga ma'i rang bzhin du rig na ni de'i tshe rig pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis snga ma'i rang bzhin du rig na ni de'i tshe rig pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the prior nature is known by another, then at that time it is not known.

original: snga ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gzhan du rig pa ni bde ba la sogs pa rig par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: snga ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gzhan du rig pa ni bde ba la sogs pa rig par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the prior nature is known in another way, then pleasure, etc. are not known,

original: gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa bzhin no //
translated: just like the pleasure of another.

original: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa da ltar ba'am gsal ba nyid du 'dzin na rnam par rtog pa med par 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa da ltar ba'am gsal ba nyid du 'dzin na rnam par rtog pa med par 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if pleasure, etc. are apprehended as present or manifest, they are not apprehended without conceptualization.

original: 'on te yid kyi bde ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzin pas gzung ba yin no zhes 'dod na /
analyzed: 'on te yid kyi bde ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzin pas gzung ba yin no zhes 'dod na /
translated: But if you maintain that mental pleasure is apprehended by the apprehension that is associated with conceptualization,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: because

original: gang zhig dran pas rig pas na //
analyzed: gang zhig dran pas rig pas na //
translated: If it is said that it is known through memory,

original: gal te yid du brjod na ni //
analyzed: gal te yid du brjod na ni //
translated: If it is said that it is expressed by the mind,

original: snga ma'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: snga ma'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the nature of the former is realized,

original: de ni bde bar rig ma yin //
analyzed: de ni bde bar rig ma yin //
translated: It is not known as pleasure.

original: de'i tshe nyid na skyes pa de //
analyzed: de'i tshe nyid na skyes pa de //
translated: At that very time, that which is born

original: mngon sum rig pas rtog pa min //
analyzed: mngon sum rig pas rtog pa min //
translated: Is not conceptualized through direct knowledge.

original: gal te brjod dang 'brel pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gal te brjod dang 'brel pa'i phyir //
translated: If it is said that it is related to expression,

original: zhe na brjod pa nyid yod yin //
analyzed: zhe na brjod pa nyid yod yin //
translated: Then expression itself would exist.

original: bde ba de las tha dad na //
analyzed: bde ba de las tha dad na //
translated: If pleasure were different from that,

original: ji ltar 'brel pa srid par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar 'brel pa srid par 'gyur //
translated: How could a relationship be possible?

original: dus gcig rig pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: dus gcig rig pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: Merely through the knowledge of one time,

original: 'brel pa nyid du brjod ma yin ;
analyzed: 'brel pa nyid du brjod ma yin ;
translated: It is not said to be a relationship.

original: / yid kyang gzugs sogs rnam pa yi //
analyzed: / yid kyang gzugs sogs rnam pa yi //
translated: The mind also does not exist in the form and so on

original: rang bdag nyid la gnas ma yin //
analyzed: rang bdag nyid la gnas ma yin //
translated: In its own nature.

original: skye ba de tshe nyid yod phyir //
analyzed: skye ba de tshe nyid yod phyir //
translated: At the time of birth, because it already exists,

original: ji ltar rnam rtog yul du 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam rtog yul du 'gyur //
translated: How could it be the object of conceptualization?

original: gal te 'di ni don la yang //
analyzed: gal te 'di ni don la yang //
translated: If this is also the case for the object,

original: ji ltar rtog par 'thad 'gyur te //
analyzed: ji ltar rtog par 'thad 'gyur te //
translated: How could it be tenable as conceptualized?

original: de yis don bzung med pas na //
analyzed: de yis don bzung med pas na //
translated: Because it does not apprehend the object,

original: ngo bo nyid la'ang mi rtog phyir //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid la'ang mi rtog phyir //
translated: It does not conceptualize even its own nature.

original: khyed kyis de skad brjod pa de ni bden te /
analyzed: khyed kyis de skad brjod pa de ni bden te /
translated: What you have said is true.

original: gal te don ni 'dzin 'gyur na //
analyzed: gal te don ni 'dzin 'gyur na //
translated: If it apprehends an object,

original: de 'dir ji ltar rnam rtog 'gyur //
analyzed: de 'dir ji ltar rnam rtog 'gyur //
translated: how can it be a conceptualization?

original: 'on te don min 'dzin na yang //
analyzed: 'on te don min 'dzin na yang //
translated: But if it does not apprehend an object,

original: de 'dir ji ltar rnam rtog yin //üîΩ'on te don du sgro 'dogs pas //
analyzed: de 'dir ji ltar rnam rtog yin // 'on te don du sgro 'dogs pas //
translated: how can it be a conceptualization?

original: de la rtog par brjod na ni //üîΩ'dzin dang mi 'dzin las grol ba'i //
analyzed: de la rtog par brjod na ni // 'dzin dang mi 'dzin las grol ba'i //
translated: But if it is called a conceptualization because it superimposes an object,

original: don gzhan der yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: don gzhan der yang yod ma yin //
translated: then that is not the case with respect to the other,

original: 'dzin @285b dang sgro 'dogs yod pa'i phyir //üîΩgal te rtog par 'dod ce na //
analyzed: 'dzin @285b dang sgro 'dogs yod pa'i phyir // gal te rtog par 'dod ce na //
translated: which is free from the activity of apprehending and superimposing.

original: 'dzin dang sgro 'dogs gcig na ni //
analyzed: 'dzin dang sgro 'dogs gcig na ni //
translated: If you assert that it is a conceptualization because there is apprehension and superimposition,

original: gnyis yod ces bya bden ma yin //
analyzed: gnyis yod ces bya bden ma yin //
translated: then it is not true that there are two,üîΩbecause apprehension and superimposition are one.

original: de la phyogs gcig la gnas pa'i //
analyzed: de la phyogs gcig la gnas pa'i //
translated: The fault of abiding in one part

original: skyon ni snga nyid brjod zin to //üîΩ'on te de dag dbye ba ni //
analyzed: skyon ni snga nyid brjod zin to // 'on te de dag dbye ba ni //
translated: has already been stated.üîΩBut if there is a division of these two,

original: yod na gnyis su thal 'gyur te //
analyzed: yod na gnyis su thal 'gyur te //
translated: then it follows that there are two,üîΩa cognition that is associated with conceptualization

original: rnam rtog bcas pa'i rig pa dang ; / de nyid tshe na rtog med pa'o //üîΩde'i phyir / 'dzin pa med kyang gang zhig la //
analyzed: rnam rtog bcas pa'i rig pa dang ; / de nyid tshe na rtog med pa'o // de'i phyir / 'dzin pa med kyang gang zhig la //
translated: and a cognition that is not conceptual at that time.üîΩTherefore,üîΩthat which has the pride of apprehending

original: 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal yod de nyid //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal yod de nyid //
translated: even though there is no apprehension,

original: brtags pas nged kyi phyogs 'di la //
analyzed: brtags pas nged kyi phyogs 'di la //
translated: But when examined, it is said

original: rnam par rtog pa yin par brjod //üîΩde las 'dzin dang mi 'dzin las //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yin par brjod // de las 'dzin dang mi 'dzin las //
translated: That it is a conceptualization in our system.

original: gzhan pa'i nga rgyal yang gang zhig / ce na 'dzin pa med par ni //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i nga rgyal yang gang zhig / ce na 'dzin pa med par ni //
translated: And what is the pride that is different from grasping and non-grasping?

original: 'jug la byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug la byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the activity that occurs in the absence of grasping.

original: gal te ma bzung la 'jug byed //
analyzed: gal te ma bzung la 'jug byed //
translated: If it is the activity that occurs in the absence of grasping,

original: thams cad la de ji ltar min //
analyzed: thams cad la de ji ltar min //
translated: Why does it not occur in all cases?

original: gal te bzung la 'jug byed nyid //
analyzed: gal te bzung la 'jug byed nyid //
translated: If it is the activity that occurs in the presence of grasping,

original: ci yi phyir na 'jug par byed //
analyzed: ci yi phyir na 'jug par byed //
translated: Why does it occur?

original: 'o na da ni shes pa kun //
analyzed: 'o na da ni shes pa kun //
translated: Now all cognitions

original: rnam par rtog dang bcas 'gyur te //
analyzed: rnam par rtog dang bcas 'gyur te //
translated: Would be conceptual,

original: gang phyir shes pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: gang phyir shes pa thams cad kyi //
translated: Because all cognitions

original: ma bzung ba la 'jug phyir ro ;
analyzed: ma bzung ba la 'jug phyir ro ;
translated: Occur in the absence of grasping.

original: /'dir smras pa /üîΩmngon du byed pa ma yin par //üîΩgang la rnam rtog gzhan dag gis //
analyzed: /'dir smras pa / mngon du byed pa ma yin par // gang la rnam rtog gzhan dag gis //
translated: Here you may protest:üîΩThat which is not directly perceived

original: tha snyad byed pa de nyid 'dir //
analyzed: tha snyad byed pa de nyid 'dir //
translated: And is designated by other conceptualizations

original: rnam rtog 'jig rten 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: rnam rtog 'jig rten 'dod pa yin //
translated: Is what the world accepts as conceptual.

original: gang la mthong bar mngon 'dod pa //
analyzed: gang la mthong bar mngon 'dod pa //
translated: That which is directly perceived

original: shes te rtog pa med pa yin //
analyzed: shes te rtog pa med pa yin //
translated: Is known to be nonconceptual.

original: mngon du byed par mos phyir yang //
analyzed: mngon du byed par mos phyir yang //
translated: And because it is accepted that it is directly perceived,

original: mngon sum zhes ni brjod pa yin //üîΩdon dam du ni rnam shes ni //
analyzed: mngon sum zhes ni brjod pa yin // don dam du ni rnam shes ni //
translated: Are said to be direct perception.üîΩUltimately, all consciousnesses

original: thams cad rtog pa med pa nyid //üîΩthams cad ma bzung yul la ni //
analyzed: thams cad rtog pa med pa nyid // thams cad ma bzung yul la ni //
translated: Are non-conceptual.üîΩBecause they engage their objects

original: rtog pa med par 'jug phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa med par 'jug phyir ro //
translated: Without apprehending them.

original: gzhan yang / bag chags stobs las snga ma yi //
analyzed: gzhan yang / bag chags stobs las snga ma yi //
translated: Moreover, from the power of latent propensities,

original: myong ba'i khyad par rjes 'brangs te //
analyzed: myong ba'i khyad par rjes 'brangs te //
translated: The specific experiences of the past follow.

original: gang la shes pa gang skyes kyang //
analyzed: gang la shes pa gang skyes kyang //
translated: Whatever consciousness arises

original: de ni rnam rtog bcas par brjod //üîΩgang zhig gzhan gyi dbang nyid du //üîΩbyed pas 'jug par 'gyur ba yi //
analyzed: de ni rnam rtog bcas par brjod // gang zhig gzhan gyi dbang nyid du // byed pas 'jug par 'gyur ba yi //
translated: Is said to be conceptual.üîΩThe consciousness that engages

original: shes pa de ni tha snyad du //
analyzed: shes pa de ni tha snyad du //
translated: Through being made dependent on other factorsüîΩIs said conventionally

original: rnam rtog med ces brjod pa yin //
analyzed: rnam rtog med ces brjod pa yin //
translated: To be non-conceptual.

original: bde sogs rnams kyi rang bzhin la //üîΩrang rig pas ni rtog med phyir //
analyzed: bde sogs rnams kyi rang bzhin la // rang rig pas ni rtog med phyir //
translated: Because the nature of pleasure and so onüîΩIs not conceptualized by reflexive awareness,

original: de la rtog pa med par ni //
analyzed: de la rtog pa med par ni //
translated: It is asserted that

original: thams cad pa 'dod nyid yin no //
analyzed: thams cad pa 'dod nyid yin no //
translated: All consciousnesses are conceptual.

original: de phyir de dag rang nyid ni //
analyzed: de phyir de dag rang nyid ni //
translated: Therefore, those [consciousnesses] themselves

original: brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin //üîΩde la las dang byed pa yis //
analyzed: brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin // de la las dang byed pa yis //
translated: Are not related to expression.üîΩIn that regard, expression is not related

original: mngon par brjod pa 'brel ma yin //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa 'brel ma yin //
translated: To action and agent.

original: rgyun snang ba'i bde ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe 'di ni bde ba la sogs pa'o zhes mos pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa skye ba de'i tshe ci'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: rgyun snang ba'i bde ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe 'di ni bde ba la sogs pa'o zhes mos pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa skye ba de'i tshe ci'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid ma yin zhe na /
translated: When the cognition that has the nature of conviction arises in regard to the pleasure, etc., that is present, thinking ‚Äúthis is pleasure, etc.,‚Äù why is it not associated with conceptualization?

original: don bzhin du 'di la @286a * //
analyzed: don bzhin du 'di la @286a * //
translated: It is a mental perception in regard to the object, just as it is in regard to pleasure, etc.

original: yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes brjod zin to //
analyzed: yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes brjod zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / don dang bde sogs rang bzhin la //
analyzed: 'di ltar / don dang bde sogs rang bzhin la //
translated: that which engages in the nature of the object, pleasure, etc.,

original: 'di zhes bya bas 'jug pa gang //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya bas 'jug pa gang //
translated: through the expression ‚Äúthis,‚ÄùüîΩis considered to be mental perception,

original: rang bzhin dngos su 'dzin pa na //üîΩde kun yid du 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: rang bzhin dngos su 'dzin pa na // de kun yid du 'dod pa yin //
translated: since it directly apprehends the nature.

original: de la yang rtog pa'i go skabs ni ji ltar yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la yang rtog pa'i go skabs ni ji ltar yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, there is no opportunity for conceptualization in any way.

original: des na rtog pa med pa'i phyir de ni mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: des na rtog pa med pa'i phyir de ni mngon sum nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because it is free from conceptualization, it is perception.

original: gang gi tshe rang rig pa dang yid kyi mngon sum gnyi ga yang rig pa 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang rig pa dang yid kyi mngon sum gnyi ga yang rig pa 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: When both reflexive awareness and mental perception are aware,

original: phan tshun ma reg pa'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gnyis su ma rtogs she na /
analyzed: phan tshun ma reg pa'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gnyis su ma rtogs she na /
translated: how is there no apprehension of a twofold aspect, since they do not mutually contact each other?

original: 'gyur ba nyid de /
analyzed: 'gyur ba nyid de /
translated: It is just a transformation.

original: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis dmigs pa'i tshul du rnam pa gcig yin par zhen pas na /
analyzed: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis dmigs pa'i tshul du rnam pa gcig yin par zhen pas na /
translated: It is like the way that two people with eye disease apprehend two moons.

original: de ltar tha snyad mi byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar tha snyad mi byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the convention of one is not made.

original: rang gis rig pa nyid yin na ji ltar de la yang de ltar tha snyad med par 'gyur ce na /
analyzed: rang gis rig pa nyid yin na ji ltar de la yang de ltar tha snyad med par 'gyur ce na /
