original: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis kyang gsal bar snang ba yin la /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis kyang gsal bar snang ba yin la /
translated: It appears clearly by the power of meditation.

original: gsal bar snang ba nyid kyis rtog pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba nyid kyis rtog pa med pa yin te /
translated: It is free from conceptualization because it appears clearly.

original: des na mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: des na mngon sum yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is direct perception.

original: gal te don gyi mthu las byung ba'i phyir da ltar gyi don gyi yul can gyi shes pa ni rtog pa med par 'thad pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te don gyi mthu las byung ba'i phyir da ltar gyi don gyi yul can gyi shes pa ni rtog pa med par 'thad pa yin na /
translated: If it is tenable that the knowledge of the present object is free from conceptualization because it arises from the power of the object,

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / med pa'i yul can go ci ltar goms pa tsam las rtog pa med pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / med pa'i yul can go ci ltar goms pa tsam las rtog pa med pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How can the cognition of a past or future or nonexistent object be non-conceptual, simply through the force of habituation?üîΩEven though the object is nonexistent, the result of meditation is still capable of that.

original: med pa'i yul can yin yang bsgoms pa yang de lta bu'i 'bras bu la nus pa nyid do zhes ston te /üîΩ'di ltar / 'dod 'jigs mya ngan gyis brlabs dang // rkun po'i rmi sogs kyis bslad pas //
analyzed: med pa'i yul can yin yang bsgoms pa yang de lta bu'i 'bras bu la nus pa nyid do zhes ston te / 'di ltar / 'dod 'jigs mya ngan gyis brlabs dang // rkun po'i rmi sogs kyis bslad pas //
translated: Thus:üîΩOne sees what is not there,üîΩas if it were right in front of one,üîΩthrough the influence of desire, fear, grief,

original: mdun na gnas pa bzhin du ni //üîΩyang dag min ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa bzhin du ni // yang dag min ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: or the contamination of dreams of thieves, etc.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul can gyi shes pa ni don gyi nus pa las skyes pa ma yin la /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul can gyi shes pa ni don gyi nus pa las skyes pa ma yin la /
translated: The cognition that has a nonexistent object does not arise from the potentiality of the object.

original: de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not conceptual,

original: mdun na gnas pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it sees as if it were right in front of one.

original: de lta yin dang mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa can nyid kyis rtog pa med pa mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa can nyid kyis rtog pa med pa mngon sum yin no //
translated: If that were so, then because it has the aspect of something right in front of one, it is non-conceptual perception.

original: 'on kyang rtog pa dang bcas pa yin yang gsal bar snang ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtog pa dang bcas pa yin yang gsal bar snang ba yin te /
translated: Even though it is conceptual, it is a clear appearance.

original: rtog pa med pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: not because it is nonconceptual.

original: ma yin te /üîΩrnam par rtog dang rjes 'brel ni //
analyzed: ma yin te / rnam par rtog dang rjes 'brel ni //
translated: No, it is not so.

original: don gsal snang ba can ma yin //üîΩrmi lam na yang dran pa @304a * //
analyzed: don gsal snang ba can ma yin // rmi lam na yang dran pa @304a * //
translated: The conceptual is not associated with the clear manifestation of an object.

original: dran ; / de 'dra'i don ldan min par dran //
analyzed: dran ; / de 'dra'i don ldan min par dran //
translated: Memory is not of such an object.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can kho na'o zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can kho na'o zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has been shown that the nature of conceptualization is only that which has an obscure object.

original: gal te de ltar ma grub na ni /
analyzed: gal te de ltar ma grub na ni /
translated: If it were not so,

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be associated with conceptualization.

original: rnam par rtog par ni rmi lam na yang lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can du myong ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog par ni rmi lam na yang lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can du myong ste /
translated: In a dream, conceptualization is experienced as having an obscure object,

original: de dag gsal bar snang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag gsal bar snang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not clearly manifested.

original: bslad pa'i stobs kyis gsal ba yin na ni /
analyzed: bslad pa'i stobs kyis gsal ba yin na ni /
translated: If it were clear by the power of delusion,

original: 'gal ba yang rmi lam la sogs par mi gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba yang rmi lam la sogs par mi gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: even contradictory things would not be obscure in a dream, etc.

original: nyams su myong ba dran pa'i rnam pa ni rmi lam du yang mthong ste /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dran pa'i rnam pa ni rmi lam du yang mthong ste /
translated: The aspect of memory of experience is seen even in a dream.

original: de'i phyir bslad pa las rtog pa yang gsal ba nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bslad pa las rtog pa yang gsal ba nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even the conception that arises from a mistake does not have a clear appearance.

original: des na gsal ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na gsal ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Thus, consciousness that has a clear aspect is only non-conceptual.

original: 'di la bye brag tu smra bdag na re /
analyzed: 'di la bye brag tu smra bdag na re /
translated: The VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas say:

original: tshad mas grub pa'i dngos po la bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gsal bar snang ba nyid do zhes bya bar rig ste /
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa'i dngos po la bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gsal bar snang ba nyid do zhes bya bar rig ste /
translated: The power of meditation causes a clear appearance of an object that is established by valid knowledge.

original: bsgoms pas ma rig pa'i dri ma dang bral ba na don rang gi ngo bor snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgoms pas ma rig pa'i dri ma dang bral ba na don rang gi ngo bor snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When one is free from the stain of ignorance through meditation, the object appears as its own nature.

original: med pa la ni rang gi ngo bo med pas ci zhig snang / rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can yin te /
analyzed: med pa la ni rang gi ngo bo med pas ci zhig snang / rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can yin te /
translated: But if it does not exist, it has no nature. What appears? The consciousness of a yogin has past and future objects.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: Because the past and future exist.

original: 'di la bshad pa ni /üîΩmi gtsang zad par sa la sogs//
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa ni / mi gtsang zad par sa la sogs//
translated: The explanation of this is as follows:

original: yang dag min pa'ang bsgoms pa yi //
analyzed: yang dag min pa'ang bsgoms pa yi //
translated: Earth and so on are not the complete absence of excrement.üîΩThe meditation on what is not real

original: stobs kyis sprul pa rtog med dang // gsal bar snang ba can du mthong //
analyzed: stobs kyis sprul pa rtog med dang // gsal bar snang ba can du mthong //
translated: and possessing clear appearance.

original: mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin te /
translated: Impure and so on are mental contemplations of thatness.

original: nam mkha' sal sogs pa ni med do //üîΩ'on te sa la sogs pa yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' sal sogs pa ni med do // 'on te sa la sogs pa yang yod pa yin te /
translated: Space, clarity and so on do not exist.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni /
translated: If you say that earth and so on exist because they are seen by the direct perception of yogins, then it is not the case that

original: rnal 'byor par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: merely through meditation one becomes a yogin.

original: 'on kyang thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas don bzung nas /
analyzed: 'on kyang thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas don bzung nas /
translated: However, having apprehended the meaning through knowledge derived from hearing,

original: rig pa sems pa las byung bas rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: rig pa sems pa las byung bas rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: one is established through knowledge derived from contemplation.

original: sgom pa rnams kyi don yongs su rdzogs pa na phyin ci ma log pa'i yul can gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin la de dang ldan pa ni rnal 'byor pa yin no /
analyzed: sgom pa rnams kyi don yongs su rdzogs pa na phyin ci ma log pa'i yul can gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin la de dang ldan pa ni rnal 'byor pa yin no /
translated: When the meaning of meditation is fully completed, that which possesses an unmistaken object is valid knowledge and one who possesses that is a yogin.

original: de ltar yin na yang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'jug pa'i lam ni rnal 'byor yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar yin na yang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'jug pa'i lam ni rnal 'byor yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: But the path of union of serenity and insight is yoga.

original: de la gsal te 'di dag rnal 'byor pa la snang ba yin ba de lta na yang 'di ni 'bras @304b bu'i don du de kho na nyid ma yin pa snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de la gsal te 'di dag rnal 'byor pa la snang ba yin ba de lta na yang 'di ni 'bras @304b bu'i don du de kho na nyid ma yin pa snang ba yin no //
translated: Although they appear to the yogi in this way, they are not reality, but appear as if they were.

original: des na de dag gi de ni de kho na ma yin par snang ba yin na //
analyzed: des na de dag gi de ni de kho na ma yin par snang ba yin na //
translated: Therefore, they are not reality, but appear as if they were.

original: des na gal te rnal 'byor pa la de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba de tsam gyi yod par ci ltar gyur /
analyzed: des na gal te rnal 'byor pa la de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba de tsam gyi yod par ci ltar gyur /
translated: So, if they appear to the yogi as if they were not reality, how can they be?

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa la yang de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi rnag bzhin ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa la yang de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi rnag bzhin ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, even for the yogi, they are not reality.

original: snang ba tsam gyis ni de kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: snang ba tsam gyis ni de kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: But they are not reality just because they appear.

original: 'on kyang brtags pa las yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang brtags pa las yin no //
translated: They are reality only because of investigation.

original: rtogs pa tsam las skye ba bsgoms pa ni de kho na rtogs pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rtogs pa tsam las skye ba bsgoms pa ni de kho na rtogs pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
translated: The mere arising of the appearance is not the cause of the realization of reality.

original: tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'ongs na ni de ltar yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'ongs na ni de ltar yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
translated: If it were to come about through the power of valid cognition, then it would be so. This is the definite conclusion.üîΩFor,üîΩIt is said that it is not reality

original: 'di ltar / bsgoms pa tsam las byung ba'i phyir //üîΩde nyid min par brjod pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bsgoms pa tsam las byung ba'i phyir // de nyid min par brjod pa yin //
translated: because it arises merely from meditation.

original: dngos po'i sgo nas rtogs pa ni //
analyzed: dngos po'i sgo nas rtogs pa ni //
translated: The realization that comes from the object

original: dngos po nges par 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: dngos po nges par 'dod pa yin //
translated: is asserted to be the ascertainment of the object.

original: bsgoms pa tsam las ni /
analyzed: bsgoms pa tsam las ni /
translated: It is not merely the meditation

original: de phyir yang dag yang dag min //
analyzed: de phyir yang dag yang dag min //
translated: that is the result of correct or incorrect meditation.

original: gang gang shin tu bsgoms gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gang shin tu bsgoms gyur pa //
translated: Whatever is well-meditated

original: bsgoms pa yongs su rdzogs ba na //
analyzed: bsgoms pa yongs su rdzogs ba na //
translated: when meditation is complete,

original: de gsal mi rtog blo 'bras can //
analyzed: de gsal mi rtog blo 'bras can //
translated: it has the result of a clear, non-conceptual mind.

original: yod pa 'ba' zhig bsgoms pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa 'ba' zhig bsgoms pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not just the existence that is meditated upon,

original: gzhan yang bsgoms pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgoms pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but also because it has an object of meditation.

original: des na gang dang gang bsgoms pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na /
analyzed: des na gang dang gang bsgoms pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na /
translated: Therefore, whatever is meditated upon, when meditation is complete,

original: de gsal ba mi rtog pa'i blo ni shin tu bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de gsal ba mi rtog pa'i blo ni shin tu bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: it has the result of a clear, non-conceptual mind, which is the result of well-meditated meditation.

original: bsgoms pa ni gzhan du 'gyur bar ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsgoms pa ni gzhan du 'gyur bar ma mthong ngo //
translated: Meditation is not seen to change into anything else.

original: de la sngar dpyad dngos po bzhin //
analyzed: de la sngar dpyad dngos po bzhin //
translated: The object of that is like the object of previous analysis.

original: slu ba med can gang yin de //
analyzed: slu ba med can gang yin de //
translated: That which is nondeceptive is accepted as direct perception

original: bsgoms byung mngon sum tshang mar 'dod //
analyzed: bsgoms byung mngon sum tshang mar 'dod //
translated: arisen from meditation.

original: lhag ma nye bar bslad ma yin //
analyzed: lhag ma nye bar bslad ma yin //
translated: The rest are not unmistaken.

original: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is an intermediate verse.üîΩEven though the object of that is arisen from the power of meditation, the object of that is like the object of previous analysis, that is, the four noble truths, etc.

original: bsgoms pa'i sto bas las byung yang sngar dpyad pa'i dngos po 'jig rten pha rol du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa mi slu ba can mi srid pa gang yin pa de'i yul can kho na mngon sum yin gyi 'dod pa la sogs pa'i yul can
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i sto bas las byung yang sngar dpyad pa'i dngos po 'jig rten pha rol du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa mi slu ba can mi srid pa gang yin pa de'i yul can kho na mngon sum yin gyi 'dod pa la sogs pa'i yul can
translated: That which is nondeceptive is the direct perception that has that as its object, but that which has desire, etc.

original: ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ni ma yin no //
translated: as its object is not.

original: de ni gsal bar snang bas rtog pa med pa yin yang bslad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ni gsal bar snang bas rtog pa med pa yin yang bslad pa nyid yin no //
translated: Even though it is nonconceptual because it appears clearly, it is mistaken.

original: des na rmi lam gyi shes pa la sogs pa mi slu ba ni mngon sum ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na rmi lam gyi shes pa la sogs pa mi slu ba ni mngon sum ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, nondeceptive consciousness in a dream, etc. is not direct perception.

original: gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs las shes pa mngon sum ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs las shes pa mngon sum ma yin na /
translated: If consciousness arisen from the power of meditation is not direct perception,

original: mu stegs pa dang 'brel pa'i shes pa @305a * //
analyzed: mu stegs pa dang 'brel pa'i shes pa @305a * //
translated: then the consciousness of the tƒ´rthikas

original: thams cad mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: It follows that everything would be directly perceived,üîΩand it is not possible to say that they do not meditate.

original: de dag la yang bsgom pa med do zhes bya ba de ltar ni mi nus so //
analyzed: de dag la yang bsgom pa med do zhes bya ba de ltar ni mi nus so //
translated: Thus,

original: 'di ltar / do na gan 'jig rten thun mong ba //üîΩde 'ga' zhig la yod do zhes //
analyzed: 'di ltar / do na gan 'jig rten thun mong ba // de 'ga' zhig la yod do zhes //
translated: How could it be that the world in general

original: nges par rig pa las 'das par //
analyzed: nges par rig pa las 'das par //
translated: is not beyond the knowledge

original: gnas pa min par ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas pa min par ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: that some things exist?

original: des na mu stegs byed gzhan de dag gis bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum gyis grub pa'i rang gi lugs kyi tshogs kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i don gyi tshogs med do zhes bya ba de ltar ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: des na mu stegs byed gzhan de dag gis bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum gyis grub pa'i rang gi lugs kyi tshogs kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i don gyi tshogs med do zhes bya ba de ltar ga la 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could it be that the collection of objects belonging to their own system, which is established by the direct perception that arises from meditation, does not exist?

original: des na de dag gis nye bar bstan pa las kyang 'jug par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de dag gis nye bar bstan pa las kyang 'jug par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one should engage in their teachings.

original: rjes su dpag pa la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that is not so because it is undermined by inference and so on,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: dbang po las 'das rig bya min //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das rig bya min //
translated: It is not an object of knowledge that transcends the senses,

original: drang srong mig gis mthong gyur pa'i //
analyzed: drang srong mig gis mthong gyur pa'i //
translated: but is seen by the eye of the ·πõ·π£is.

original: dngos la de dag rnams kyi tshig / rjes su dpag pas gnod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos la de dag rnams kyi tshig / rjes su dpag pas gnod mi 'gyur //
translated: The words of those who say this are not undermined by inference.
